structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 314, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 107, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec.69. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 1. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 148, secs. 1 and 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3179, 3181, 3182.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Equalization of assessments in cities of second class.
